text: Subhodeep Mukherjee (Bengali: শুভদীপ মুখারজী) is a Ghazal singer. He performs Hindustani classical and experimental Ghazal ‘Jugalbandis’. He belongs to the Kolkata. ==Career== upright Subhodeep started performing professionally in various concerts from the year 2000. He played his international debut concert at Los Angeles, United States in 2015. ==References== Category:Living people Category:Indian male classical musicians Category:1970 births Category:Bengali people Category:Bengali Hindus
title: Subhodeep Mukherjee
